name: Gem Heart
description:
Gem Heart

A game made for Ludum Dare 44 - "Your life is currency"

This is a platformer somewhat inspired by Shovel Knight and Downwell.

You are a small jelly blob trying to reach the exit door of every level. In your way are different kinds of obstacles and enemies trying to ruin your day.

This is my 2nd ever Ludum Dare game and my first ever platformer so I apologize for all the bugs and jankyness of the game. I ran into a lot of issues while making it. I still hope that you can get some joy out of it!

Feel free to leave any feedback here in the comments or over on ldjam.com

I would appreciate every critique you could offer!

Credits:

  • Made using Unity 2019.1
  • Font is Munro by tenbytwenty
  • Sound effects made in Bfxrw

P.S. As for the bugs, unsure when, if ever I'm going to fix them. It would require me to redo the whole project as it's just a total mess. It is a project that I might expand on later if I get to it. As this was more of a proof of concept and a learning experience than a true competitor in the jam.
